segments.text: Yes . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am glad to inform you that you are expected to come for an interview in our head office tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you please tell me the address ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sure . It is No . 50 in the Fifth Avenue where there is a fairground and a museum .
segments.speaker: S1
